about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Imagine Innovation - Redefining Air Purification

hero.title: Imagine Innovation
hero.subtitle: Redefining Air Purification
hero.description: Apolnus is committed to innovative air purification technology with filter-free electrostatic technology at its core, creating eco-friendly and sustainable healthy living environments.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Through innovative technology, we provide the purest air for global users and create healthy and sustainable living environments. We believe that breathing pure air is a fundamental right for everyone.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become a leading global air purification technology brand, improving global air quality and protecting every breath with filter-free, eco-friendly, and efficient products.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Continuously develop breakthrough technologies to lead the air purification industry

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Filter-free design reduces environmental impact and practices sustainable development

quality.title: Quality Commitment
quality.description: Strict quality control to provide the most reliable products and services

customer.title: Customer First
customer.description: User-centric approach with comprehensive after-sales service

about.t_0d2fdbc6: In an era accustomed to compromise and instant gratification, is it foolish to insist on a singular, pure conviction?
about.t_abbd6db6: The sleepless nights, the all-consuming dedication, the relentless, fearless drive... We have all shed tears in the pursuit of protecting what truly matters.
about.t_aceda23c: Upon waking, we may face endless anxiety, be bruised and battered, or remain unrecognized.
about.t_6d1b140a: Yet, we know deep down that it is this sincerity and integrity that truly move people. We are defined by this: we would rather be seen as fools than abandon the pure obsession within our hearts.
about.t_0bc4f365: Our purity is our refusal to compromise on challenges; our struggle is the practical realization of self-imposed perfection.
about.t_57c96e51: We believe in genuine effort over opportunism, and purity over utility. Apolnus is a brand born for the ultimate. We refine every ambitious vision through countless hours of rigorous dedication, forging inspiration that genuinely moves the soul.
about.t_619cc303: Apolnus crafts more than just products; we deliver the ultimate answer to taste and refinement, earned through sacrifice and unwavering conviction.
about.t_34530f41: We believe that those who return to the essence, honor the struggle, and dare to be utterly foolish in their singular pursuit, will ultimately redefine the standards of this era.
about.t_293591ac: 7F, No. 15, Sec. 2, Keelung Rd., Xinyi District, Taipei City

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Find answers to your questions quickly
faq.t_57a557a7: Find the answers you need, or contact our customer service team

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how Apolnus ("we", "our", or "the Company") collects, uses, discloses, and protects your personal information. By using our website, products, or services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.content: Personal information we may collect includes but is not limited to: name, email address, phone number, mailing address, product serial number, purchase history, etc. This information may be collected through: website registration, product warranty registration, customer service inquiries, online shopping, newsletter subscription, etc.

usage.title: Information Usage
usage.content: Personal information we collect will be used for the following purposes: providing products and services, processing orders and warranties, customer service and technical support, marketing and promotional activities, improving product and service quality, legal compliance, etc. We will not use your personal information for other purposes without your consent.

disclosure.title: Information Disclosure
disclosure.content: We will not disclose your personal information to third parties unless we have your consent or are required by law. We may need to disclose your information in the following circumstances: compliance with legal requests from judicial or government authorities, protection of our rights and safety or those of others, prevention of fraud or other illegal activities, business transfer or merger.

security.title: Information Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, disclosure, modification, or destruction. These measures include: encrypted transmission, access control, regular security reviews, employee training, etc. However, no method of internet transmission or electronic storage is 100% secure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal information: access or request to view, request copies, request supplementation or correction, request to stop collection, processing or use, request deletion. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the contact information provided at the end of this policy.

cookies.title: Cookies Usage
cookies.content: This website uses Cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience, analyze website traffic, and provide personalized content. You can manage or refuse Cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect the normal operation of some website features.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Links
thirdParty.content: This website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy policies or content of these third-party websites. When you click these links and leave our website, we recommend reading the privacy policy of that website.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not directed at children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you discover that we have collected personal information from a child, please contact us immediately and we will delete the relevant information as soon as possible.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any significant changes will be announced on this website and the "Last Updated" date will be updated. We recommend that you regularly review this policy to stay informed of the latest information. Continued use of this website or services indicates your acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or need assistance, please contact us through the following methods:

privacy.t_2706bf22: Apolnus Ventures LLC ("Apolnus," "we," "our," or "us") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, process, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our websites, online store, customer service channels, marketing pages, or participate in our activities (collectively referred to as the "Services").

privacy.t_eb058e6c: Photos or videos (e.g., product usage submitted for support)

privacy.t_c1e81758: Elevating product quality and service processes

privacy.t_cff74bbf: Sending updates, promotions, and product announcements

privacy.t_4db07eca: Detecting, preventing, and addressing fraudulent or unauthorized activities
privacy.t_a31210c8: Protecting the rights, property, and safety of Apolnus, our users, and the public
privacy.t_045533aa: E. Other Purposes With Your Consent

privacy.t_972edec9: Enable essential website functions (e.g., login, checkout)
privacy.t_ca121ece: You can manage or disable cookies through your browser settings; however, certain functions may not operate properly if essential cookies are disabled.
privacy.t_c911e15c: We do not sell or trade your personal information. We only share information under the following conditions:
privacy.t_fbab5c91: We may share information with trusted third-party partners who assist in providing the following services:
privacy.t_56fdbb43: These partners are contractually required to protect your information and use it solely for the services they provide.
privacy.t_c0f73a95: We may disclose information under the following circumstances:
privacy.t_7a48f5ae: Response to Legitimate Government or Court Requests
privacy.t_3b4ba1a7: Prevention of Fraud, Security Threats, or Illegal Activities
privacy.t_3eecc53b: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or asset transfer, your information may be transferred as part of the transaction, remaining subject to continued privacy protections.
privacy.t_4c752636: If you explicitly consent, we may share information for other purposes.
privacy.t_e507c1e9: Our services may involve processing your information in countries outside of your country of residence, including locations where data protection laws may differ. We take reasonable measures to ensure your information remains protected during such transfers.
privacy.t_46447a56: We retain personal information only when necessary for the following purposes:
privacy.t_54f6b8a8: When no longer required, the information will be securely deleted or anonymized.
privacy.t_bdc9336a: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have the right to:

privacy.t_fe8f249e: Our services are not directed at individuals below the legal age of maturity. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a minor without appropriate consent, we will immediately take steps to delete it.
privacy.t_81f910d9: We implement reasonable administrative, technical, and physical safeguards to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. If you suspect unauthorized use of your account or information, please notify us immediately.

privacy.t_4ffde27e: If you have any questions, requests, or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy or your personal information, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Apolnus website and services. Before using this website or services, please read the following Terms of Service carefully. By using this website or services, you agree to comply with all provisions of these Terms of Service.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: Using this website or services indicates that you accept and agree to comply with these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree to any part of these Terms of Service, please do not use this website or services. The Company reserves the right to modify or update these Terms of Service at any time.

account.title: Account Registration
account.content: Using certain services may require account registration. You agree to provide true, accurate, and complete registration information and update it promptly to maintain accuracy. You are responsible for maintaining the security and confidentiality of your account and are responsible for all activities conducted under your account. If you discover any unauthorized use, please notify us immediately.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Conduct
prohibited.content: You agree not to engage in the following behaviors: violating any applicable laws or regulations, infringing on others' intellectual property rights or other rights, uploading or distributing malware, viruses, or other harmful code, engaging in fraud, harassment, threats, or other improper behavior, interfering with or disrupting the normal operation of this website or services, unauthorized access to systems or networks of this website or services, using automated tools or bots to access this website.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectual.content: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, images, videos, audio, trademarks, logos, software, etc., is protected by intellectual property laws and belongs to the Company or its licensors. Without written permission, you may not copy, modify, distribute, display, sell, or otherwise use this content.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.content: You may have the opportunity to post or submit content on this website (such as comments, reviews, images, etc.). You warrant that you own or have obtained the necessary rights to post such content. You grant the Company a non-exclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, worldwide right to use, copy, modify, display, and distribute the content you submit. The Company reserves the right to delete any user content that is inappropriate or violates these terms.

warranty.title: Disclaimer
warranty.content: This website and services are provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties, including but not limited to warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement. The Company does not guarantee that this website or services will be uninterrupted, error-free, or virus-free. You use this website or services at your own risk.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, the Company and its directors, employees, agents, or partners shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, punitive, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use this website or services, including but not limited to loss of profits, data loss, or business interruption.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless the Company and its directors, employees, and agents from any claims, losses, liabilities, expenses (including reasonable attorney fees) arising from your violation of these Terms of Service, infringement of others' rights, or violation of laws.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: The Company reserves the right to suspend or terminate your use of this website or services at any time without prior notice, especially when you violate these Terms of Service. After termination, your right to use this website or services will immediately cease, but provisions of these Terms of Service that should continue to be effective after termination will remain in effect.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms of Service are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of China (Taiwan). Any disputes arising from these Terms of Service shall be submitted to the jurisdiction of the Taipei District Court in Taiwan.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through the following methods:

careers.t_1d3e10e3: Empowering like-minded professionals with rewarding careers and significant growth opportunities
careers.t_87e54ad9: Join Apolnus and turn your vision into reality
careers.t_b71ace14: In the right role, your imagination will truly shine
careers.t_61af37f1: Join us and create a better future together
careers.t_2a0c9fb5: We are seeking exceptional talent to join our team. If you possess a passion for cutting-edge air purification technology, kindly submit your CV to our dedicated recruitment inbox.

rd.title: R&D Team
rd.description: Making products "smart, sharp, and intelligent." We continuously deepen our expertise in air purification technology, intelligent control, and materials science to create groundbreaking products. While creating products, we refine ourselves like we refine our products, constantly striving to become better.

marketing.title: Marketing & Sales Team
marketing.description: Empowering technology, bringing Apolnus' vision and products to the world. We gather inspiration and creativity from around the globe, using compelling words and images to help more people understand how Apolnus products bring a fresh perspective to healthy living, bringing our products into households everywhere.

support.title: Product Application & Technical Support Team
support.description: Starting from the heart, making technology more humane. We are committed to providing global Apolnus users with full lifecycle services from pre-sales to after-sales, through diverse service channels, intelligent service tools, and innovative service solutions, safeguarding every healthy breathing journey.

operations.title: Operations Team
operations.description: Being the most valuable partner to the business. Our operations team consists of experts in human resources, administration, legal, finance, and other fields, empowering the business with professionalism. You will join us in making Apolnus a spiritual home where like-minded people realize their dreams and transcend themselves.

compensation.title: Competitive Compensation
compensation.description: Offering market-competitive salary packages that reward your contributions appropriately

growth.title: Growth Opportunities
growth.description: Comprehensive training system and career development planning to support your professional growth

culture.title: Team Culture
culture.description: Open and inclusive work environment, creating value together with like-minded partners

health.title: Health Benefits
health.description: Comprehensive health insurance and regular medical checkups, protecting you and your family's health

introduction.title: Back to One. Born Again
introduction.description: The One X air purifier features an innovative filter-free design, combining UVC deep ultraviolet sterilization technology with high-efficiency electrostatic dust collection to provide you with a truly eco-friendly, economical, and highly effective air purification solution.

filterFree.title: Filter-Free Design
filterFree.description: No filter replacement needed, reducing operating costs while being environmentally friendly and economical

uvSterilization.title: UVC Deep UV Sterilization
uvSterilization.description: Effectively eliminates bacteria, viruses, and microorganisms in the air

quietOperation.title: Quiet Operation
quietOperation.description: Low-noise design that won't disturb your work or rest

cta.title: Experience Pure Air, Starting with One X
cta.description: Buy One X now and enjoy a healthy lifestyle

disclaimer.note1: * All performance data for One X were obtained under specific conditions in third-party laboratories. Actual performance may vary depending on usage environment, space conditions, operating methods, and other factors.
disclaimer.note2: * CADR (Particulate Matter) 441.4 m³/h: Data from CVC Testing & Certification (Report No.: WTS2025-2843-1), tested according to GB/T 18801-2022 standard.
disclaimer.note3: * Formaldehyde removal rate 99.2%: Data from CVC Testing & Certification (Report No.: WTS2025-2843-2), test results.
disclaimer.note4: * Influenza A virus (H1N1) removal rate 99.93%: Data from CVC Testing & Certification (Report No.: GJW2025-0726), tested in experimental chamber for 1 hour.
disclaimer.note5: * Pet odor (ammonia) removal rate 94.7%: Data from SGS Taiwan (Report No.: DNP25300025), tested in experimental chamber.
disclaimer.note6: * UVC LED 99.99% (E. coli): Data from Guangdong Detection Center of Microbiology (Report No.: 2021FM05916R01D). This data is the test result of UVC LED components under irradiation.
disclaimer.note7: * Ozone concentration 0.0086 ppm: Data from SGS Taiwan (Report No.: TSSH2403000201T0).
disclaimer.note8: * Safety standards: Product tested by SGS Taiwan (Report No.: TSSH2403000201T0), complies with CNS 60335-1 and CNS 60335-2-65 standards.

productOneXDownloads.t_50263c10: Download the user manual, technical documents, and related materials for the One X
productOneXDownloads.t_1dea0970: If you cannot find the required document or have any questions about the product, please contact our dedicated Customer Service team.

productOneXFAQ.t_16d8e84c: If your question is not listed above, please contact our Customer Service team. We are dedicated to assisting you.

oneX.t_896ba2a4: The One X features an innovative, filter-free design, eliminating the need for regular filter replacements and significantly lowering operating costs. Utilizing advanced ionic purification technology, it effectively removes airborne contaminants, ensuring a healthy indoor environment for you.
oneX.t_5b061551: With a CADR rating of 441.4 m³/h, the One X rapidly purifies indoor air. It effectively eliminates contaminants such as formaldehyde, influenza viruses, and pet odors, allowing you and your family to breathe with confidence.
oneX.t_9cfe9f53: H1N1 Influenza A Virus Removal Rate
oneX.t_645a2103: * All One X performance data were measured under specific conditions by independent third-party laboratories. Actual performance may vary depending on the usage environment, spatial conditions, and operational methods.
oneX.t_4db860e3: * CADR (Particulate Matter) 441.4 m³/h: Data is provided by CVC Testing Technology Co., Ltd. (Report No.: WTS2025-2843-1), tested strictly in accordance with the GB/T 18801-2022 standard.
oneX.t_2f503d3a: * Formaldehyde Removal Rate 99.2%: Data is provided by CVC Testing Technology Co., Ltd. (Report No.: WTS2025-2843-2), based on rigorous testing results.
oneX.t_30bbe123: * Influenza A Virus (H1N1) Removal Rate 99.93%: Data is provided by CVC Testing Technology Co., Ltd. (Report No.: GJW2025-0726), based on 1 hour of testing within the experimental chamber.
oneX.t_ae694e91: * Pet Odor (Ammonia) Removal Rate 94.7%: Data is provided by SGS Taiwan (Report No.: DNP25300025), based on testing results conducted in the experimental chamber.
oneX.t_50d56e69: * UVC LED Sterilization 99.99% (E. coli): Data is provided by the Guangdong Detection Center of Microbiology (Report No.: 2021FM05916R01D). This figure represents the test results of the UVC LED component under irradiation conditions.
oneX.t_2a2d68fc: * Ozone concentration 0.0086 ppm: Data sourced from SGS Taiwan (Report No.: TSSH2403000201T0).
oneX.t_67b0f9c0: * Safety Standards: The product has passed testing by SGS Taiwan (Report No.: TSSH2403000201T0) and complies with CNS 60335-1 and CNS 60335-2-65 standards.

ultraS7.t_0e1aa147: Full-Spectrum Nano Purification: Redefining Healthy Breathing
ultraS7.t_a0dca879: The Ultra S7 employs advanced Nano-Grade Filtration technology, effectively capturing ultrafine particles ranging from 14.6nm to 101.8nm, achieving an efficiency rate exceeding 99.9%. PM2.5, bacteria, and viruses are all effectively intercepted.
ultraS7.t_ca106080: Operating at a mere 19.3 dB(A) in Sleep Mode, the Ultra S7 is quieter than a library. Use it nightly without compromising your sleep quality, allowing you to enjoy purified air in perfect silence.
ultraS7.t_7d62b8b2: * All Ultra S7 performance data were measured under specific conditions in a third-party laboratory. Actual performance may vary depending on usage environment, spatial conditions, operating methods, and other factors.
ultraS7.t_2f463f44: * CASR (Particulate Matter) 2.88 cmm: Data sourced from AUDIX Technology Corporation (Report No.: APC113200-02), tested in accordance with CNS 16098 standard.
ultraS7.t_2e09a450: * Nanofiltration Power >99.9%: Data sourced from Jien Ke Huan Neng Technology Co., Ltd. (Report No.: NCSA-2024AC-0090), based on tests conducted on particulates of 14.6nm, 51.4nm, and 101.8nm.
ultraS7.t_bf3ada14: * Bacteria Removal Rate >99.9%: Data sourced from SGS Taiwan (Report No.: DNP24A00004), based on results from testing conducted in an experimental chamber.
ultraS7.t_3e5d4330: * Pet Odor Removal Performance: Data sourced from CVC Testing Technology Co., Ltd. (Report No.: WTS2024-25478), based on testing results conducted in the experimental chamber.
ultraS7.t_5068d4cb: * Cigarette Odor Removal Performance: Data sourced from CVC Testing Technology Co., Ltd. (Report No.: WTS2024-24887-2), based on testing results conducted in the experimental chamber.
ultraS7.t_169a1325: * Operating Noise Level 19.3 dB(A): Data sourced from CVC Testing Technology Co., Ltd. (Report No.: WTS2024-24887-1), based on testing results conducted in Sleep Mode (Sleep gear).
ultraS7.t_7ba17a1c: * Safety Compliance: The product has passed BSMI certification registration (ID: R3F234), complying with Taiwan's electrical safety regulations.

productultras7.t_bf3ada14: * Bacteria Removal Rate >99.9%: Data sourced from SGS Taiwan (Report No.: DNP24A00004), based on results tested in an experimental chamber.
